sourcesContent:
import React, { useState }from 'react' function Products() { const plopperPrice = 25.99 const [plopperCount, setPlopperCount] = useState(0) function addPlopper(){ setPlopperCount(prevPlopper => prevPlopper +1) } function minusPlopper(){ setPlopperCount(prevPlopper => prevPlopper -1) } const plopperTotal = plopperPrice * plopperCount const jigPrice = 20.99 const [jigCount, setJigCount] = useState(0) function addJig(){ setJigCount(prevjig => prevjig +1) } function minusJig(){ setJigCount(prevjig => prevjig -1) } const jigTotal = jigPrice * jigCount const spoonPrice = 15.99 const [spoonCount, setSpoonCount] = useState(0) function addSpoon(){ setSpoonCount(prevSpoon => prevSpoon +1) } function minusSpoon(){ setSpoonCount(prevSpoon => prevSpoon -1) } const spoonTotal = spoonPrice * spoonCount const subTotal = plopperTotal + jigTotal + spoonTotal const stateTax = (subTotal * .06).toFixed(2) const grandTotal = subTotal + stateTax return (

Products

  • Whopper Plopper({plopperPrice}) {plopperCount}

    ${plopperTotal}

  • Spin Jig({jigPrice}) {jigCount}

    ${jigTotal}

  • Jiggin' Spoon({spoonPrice}) {spoonCount}

    ${spoonTotal}

    • Order Subtotal ${subTotal}
    • KY Sales Tax ${stateTax}
    • Grand Total
    ) } export default Products
